body_html:
Adding some data points: I can repro this with a master build, as well as building v0.4.1 tag from source. However it works fine for me when running from 0.4.1 installed from conda.

This is a bit confusing to me. CC @ezyang for more thoughts.

body:
Adding some data points: I can repro this with a master build, as well as building v0.4.1 tag from source. However it works fine for me when running from 0.4.1 installed from conda. 

This is a bit confusing to me. CC @ezyang for more thoughts.
